jump_scares.spoiler: A sudden bang on the window startles Manuel and Altair
Manuel turns around with the camera, and Altair is standing right in front of him
Manuel turns the camera down from the ceiling and spots Altair standing in front of him with her back turned
While unresponsively sitting on a chair and looking down, Altair suddenly grabs the camera as Manuel points it at her
A door suddenly slams shut on its own
While lying on the floor, Altair suddenly springs upwards and begins to scream
The ceiling lamp suddenly explodes
While Altair plays with something bloody in her hands, an inhuman hand suddenly reaches and grabs her
Su-yeon sits up in bed suddenly and looks around, but no one is there
Su-mi is startled when her stepmother, standing right behind her, begins to talk
Images of a girl with bloodied hands flash on the screen as Su-yeon lies in bed dreaming
Su-yeon sees a woman crawling across the floor, she stands up quickly with her head at an unnatural angle
The woman moves towards Su-yeon who is now cowering in her bed
The woman’s head moves extremely close to Su-yeon, who then wakes up from her nightmare
Mi-hee recalls to her husband seeing a dead girl under the kitchen sink, the scene then abruptly cuts to an image of the dead girl
A hand comes out from underneath the kitchen sink and grabs the stepmother. [Video]
Moo-hyeon lifts the cover off the bird cage and notices a dead bird
The kettle beings to make a high pitched whistling noise
The bloodied bag begins to move just as Su-mi is about to touch it
The stepmother sees something pull back from behind a wall in Su-yeon’s bedroom
The door closes suddenly and the lights dim while the stepmother is in Su-yeon’s bedroom
A ghost crawls out from between some sheets
Wee turns the light on and surprises Pim
An abrupt flashback may startles some viewers
Pim opens her eyes in bed and sees a corpse lying beside her. [Video]
Pim looks in the mirror and her reflection changes into the ghost of Ploy. [Video]
During a dream Pim turns around and blood is dripping from her eyes
Pim looks up and the ghost of Ploy is hanging from the fan
While in the bath, a hand grabs Pim and pulls her under the water
Pim suddenly drops the torch and the torchlight reveals someone sitting in a chair
Pim turns and the torch shines on a ghost with a demonic face. [Video]
Something lands on the bed while Wee is crawling underneath it
Pim is grabbed through a sheet
Pim suddenly sees the ghost of Ploy underneath the sheet. [Video]
Pim moves some coat-hangers in her wardrobe to reveal a ghostly face
Pim sees Ploy’s ghost in the back seat of the car
Pim see Ploy’s face in the reflection of a window
Pim hugs Wee however when she looks again he has transformed into Ploy
Pim’s mother grabs Wee
Wee is hit on the head by a glass object
A body falls out in front of Wee
Ploy appears in front of the crawling Wee
Wee’s face suddenly transforms into Pim’s ghost
Something bumps into the car and it violently shakes
The camera cuts from the driver to a man standing in the road
Marc suddenly brakes the van after hearing a noise
Marc looks up to the car window and a man is on the other side watching him, which causes him to scream
The little girl turns to face the side while on the ground and a corpse with gouged out eyes is right in front of her
When the lights go out while Som is banging on the door, it suddenly opens
Shane looks up and sees someone standing behind a transcluent curtain
Shane leans forwards to pick up the watch he dropped, revealing the ghost woman sitting in the seat right next to his
Shane forces the elevator door open, followed by a cut to the ghost woman right outside jumping at him
A ghostified looking Som lunges at Shane from the darkness
While Shane is standing on top of a cardboard cut-out of the ghost, it suddenly turns into the real ghost when he looks down at it
While the ghost woman is slowly approaching Shane from behind, when he turns around she moves right in front of the camera
While Shane is running the ghost woman suddenly appears in front of him and attacks with a knife
The screen fades to black, and a few seconds later there is a cut to the ghost woman on the film’s poster
The credits begin to roll over a still frame of the woman hanging, but she suddenly springs back upwards a few seconds later and looks at the camera
A phone rings during a tense scene
A squawking bird suddenly flies at Amanda
Marcus trips over during a quiet scene
A doll enters the room and walks up to Giordani
An unknown assailant comes through the window and strikes Giordani
Marcus shines the torch on a skeleton
An abrupt cut back to Martha in the present may startle some viewers
The toy’s sudden noise may startle some viewers
Eric gets scared by Sara when she opens the bathroom door
The toy’s noise startles Eric
A loud sound comes from the walkie-talkie
After a tense scene, Daniel’s hand suddenly covers Eric’s mouth
The TV turns on loudly
Daniel jumping from the chair after hearing to Eric’s voice along with a loud sound may startle some viewers
Daniel’s voice scares Ruth
The voice of Ruth interrupting the silent tense scene may startle some viewers
After a tense scene, a loud noise comes out of Gérman’s headphones
The screen cuts abruptly to a woman screaming
A toy’s noise spooks Sara
When Sara tries to touch Eric, he quickly crawls under the bed
Eric jumps off the bed to the front of Sara
The witch puts her hand on Sara’s face accompanied by a loud noise
The hanged body of Sara bursts through the room’s window
Something jumps on Daniel
A gunshot is fired frightening Ruth and Gérman
The scene cuts abruptly to a man yelling
A screaming woman runs by in front of Gérman
The witch jumps on Gérman
The witch screams at Ruth twice
Eric runs past Daniel accompanied by a loud sound
The witch screams at Daniel
Some viewers might get scared when Ruth shows up in front of Gérman
Eric’s voice on the walkie-talkie may startle some viewers
In a post-credit scene, a woman being exorcised jumps and screams

movies.title: Errementari: The Blacksmith and the Devil

jump_scares.spoiler: A snake suddenly gets hit by a stone
A gloved hand suddenly appears as Michèle attempts to close the glass doors
There is an abrupt flashback to the masked man attacking Michèle
A bird flies into a window
Michèle’s cat jumps on her during a tense scene
The masked man appears behind Michèle
A deer jumps in front of Michèle’s car
Michèle turns around and the masked man is standing in front of her
Eriko suddenly springs up from her sleep and gasps
The train suddenly shakes, startling the group
Kato suddenly pulls the trigger, shooting Eriko
A sword suddenly flies out of the fog and stabs Kato
A car suddenly explodes
Gantz suddenly closes its compartments with a loud mechanical noise
Several compartments suddenly come out of the sphere with a loud mechanical noise
The alien child suddenly spits a strange goo over the group
The child suddenly implodes, splattering black goo all over the room
Kishimoto suddenly tackles the alien from the side
Several compartments once again suddenly come out of Gantz
The presumably dead alien jumps back up behind Kato
The alien loudly implodes
The large statue implodes, sending rocks flying everywhere
The statue suddenly begins to move, attacking Kurono with its swords
As the statue’s reflection slowly becomes visible, it attacks, shattering the glass
The statue suddenly begins to attack at extreme speed
Wee wakes up to a bunch of medical dolls standing in the room
The nurses tell the story of a man who died in the ER, with third degree burns. While they talk, pictures and short unsettling clips show up accompanied by loud noises
A security guard trips and falls over a metal tray cart during a tense and quiet scene
The dead man turns toward the camera and growls as Wee snaps a picture with his phone
When young Gla closes the fridge door there’s a doll sitting behind it, with sudden eerie music
Young Gla’s father suddenly appears close to the camera with a loud sound
A loud thud when Wee accidentally walks into some boxes
The wheelchair is right in front of them when they turn their camera
An echoing thud as the third wheelchair crashes into the first two
Things start falling down from the shelves and furniture moves by itself, accompanied with eerie music
A quick flashback of the first ghost encounter is shown in a way less intense moment
The laptop opens up by itself
While Wee is screaming at the ghost of Gla, the elevator shakes and the light turns off, with a loud bang
The elevator makes a loud sudden noise
The lights break as Wee removes Mai’s shirt
Wee is thrown away from Mai’s body
There’s a loud clatter as the whiteboard starts to move on its own
During a silent moment there’s a fast camera movement to suddenly show an angry Gla appearing in front of Wee, followed by a loud bang
The paper cutter is thrown against Wee
A medical doll appears behind Wee accompanied by a loud noise as its head falls off
During this scene, Wee is thrown against the wall 2 times, as well as thrown up into the air while the room spins around
Gla appears and pushes Wee
The body in the body bag next to Wee suddenly rises up
When Wee turns around to film the body of Gla, his face has turned demonic
One of the boys, who is wearing a mask, jumps at the other boy
A bloodied woman suddenly appears at the window of a car
Marie closes a cabinet and in the reflection of the mirror Alex suddenly appears
As Alex lies sleeping a bloodied hand reaches out to touch her hair
Alex’s mother suddenly gasps as Marie reaches out to touch her
The gas station attendant gets a bottle of liquor out of a chiller. When he turns around the killer is standing right behind him
The killer comes up behind Marie and puts a bag over her head
The apparently dead killer suddenly grabs Marie around the throat
Alex looks at Marie through a one way mirror, suddenly Alex turns around and reaches for her
One of the statues falls over and then someone appears behind the gate
Someone says “help” and then a girl appears in the seat beside the driver
The three girls appear at the back of the room
The grandmother appears in the mirror
A blind woman whispers in Julia’s ear that there is a man behind her. Julia turns around and sees a man running from the room
Julia sees the outline of a man and shrieks in fright
The security guard bumps into Julia
Julia bumps into something while she is looking for Isaac
Julia turns around quickly and puts her hand on the mysterious man
Lia grabs Julia’s wrist while she is by the window
Ivan leaps up and grabs Julia around the neck

movies.title: Kola Superdeep / The Superdeep / Кольская сверхглубокая / Kolskaya Sverhglubokaya

jump_scares.spoiler: A loud alarm blares, startling the people in the elevator
As Kira turns to look away for a moment, Olga lunges forward and bangs her head against the window
There is an explosion in the wall panel on the right
Petr suddenly fires his gun during the tense standoff
Some wiring crackles loudly behind Anna, startling her
Sudden rockfall happens in the corridor
Eli attacks a man under the bridge
Eli jumps on Lacke and attacks him

movies.title: May The Devil Take You Too

jump_scares.spoiler: The demon who appeared behind Alfie appears again but this time with a sound effect and a scream
The ghost running up the stairs suddenly snarls
The new demon appears at the top of the ladder
The demon bursts through the door
The demon suddenly pulls back the curtain
A demon charges out of the darkness at the car
Ayub comes out from around the corner
Leo looks up and has no skin on his face
Two girl demons suddenly appear
Accompanied by a loud noise, a figure runs behind Lucie
An emaciated arm comes out from underneath the bed
The old emaciated woman on the bed suddenly screams and reaches out for Lucie
A man is shot as he answers the door
A young man is suddenly shot
Lucie sees the old emaciated woman in the kitchen
The old woman jumps on Lucie
Lucie slowly opens the door and is once again attacked by the old woman
Anna looks in the mirror and sees the mother looking at her
The old woman slides out from behind the bathtub
A sudden flashback, accompanied by the loud metallic noise of a door opening may startle some viewers
Lucie appears in the hallway as Anna tries to help the mother to the door
The chain on the floor suddenly moves
Anna shines the torch on a mutilated, chained up woman
A woman is suddenly shot
As Ofelia enters the labyrinth, the fairy lands on what appears to be a rock however it moves to reveal it is actually a faun (while not strictly a jump scare this may startle some viewers)
The toad’s tongue suddenly shoots out and takes the bug crawling on Ofelia’s face
The pale man’s hand suddenly moves after Ofelia eats a grape
Vidal turns around after hearing an explosion, this is followed by a sudden scene change to a car exploding
Vidal pulls Ofelia out from underneath the bed
While attempting to escape, Mercedes moves the umbrella to reveal Vidal watching her
After Marika begins to groan and enters some sort of trance, several birds slam into the window
After seeing some camera footage, Hori suddenly becomes very agitated
Some birds fly out at Kobayashi as he opens a sliding door
A sudden cut from a quiet scene where Kana is sleeping to an earlier scene where Hori is screaming may startle some viewers
A snowball hits the window
A blast of air comes from the fireplace
The hand of the corpse moves
A loud noise plays
A bottle tips over and falls on its own
An alarm goes off during a tense and quiet scene
The little girl leans forwards to reveal Sadako standing right behind her
Sadako’s hand suddenly reaches out of the rocks and grabs Mayu’s arm
Sadako pulls the curtain open and there is a cut to a close-up of her face
The girl bangs her hand on the glass door
Asakawa suddenly jumps up from the table in anger
The image of a dead girl hiding in a wardrobe with a terrified expression may startle some viewers
A picture is shown accompanied by a  startling sound
Reiko has a vision of her son lying in his bed beside her. Suddenly an image of a man with a towel over his head is superimposed over her son’s bed
A hand appears from under the water that grabs Reiko’s wrist
A close-up of one of Sadako’s eyes suddenly appears on screen
Reiko sees the man with the towel over his head in the television reflection
Jane looks at the bottom of the door when the door-handle begins rattling
Tun begins to develop a photo, when he looks closely at one of the faces in the photo, it spins around suddenly
The room goes dark and flashing lights from Tun’s camera reveal a person standing behind him
Tun walks into a room where a silhouette walks past the camera
Jane walks backwards and a loud yell sounds from around her
Natre appears on the front of the car
Tun flips Natre over in her bed to reveal a skeleton
A hand grabs Tun from behind
Natre is crouched on the ground and Tun sees her head sticking above the mattress
Tun looks to his side to see a face
Tun climbs down the ladder and sees a face
A creepy doll is in the mirror when the lights turn on
Jasmine suddenly wakes up and grabs Bart’s hand
The scene abruptly cuts to a girl running through the woods
The window blows open, startling Pat
An arm smashes through the window and grabs Pat around the neck. [Video]
Daniel’s dog suddenly jumps up and bites Daniel on the throat
The killer startles Sara
A bat flies through the open window
Some scissors fall from a shelf while Carlos is filling his water jug
The ghost boy appears behind Carlos and touches him on the shoulder before disappearing
Carlos is surprised by his friends pulling the curtain beside his bed across while he is sleeping
Carlos looks out of a keyhole and an eye suddenly appears. [Video]
The girl walks away from the window and is suddenly pulled down to bed
The camera cuts to the child in the background to reveal its disfigured face
The child slowly approaches the girl and there is a sudden cut to him wildly flailing his head around
The old woman suddenly opens her eyes, and they are the eyes of a goat, not a human
As the girl walks around the house, a door shuts on its own
Benigna is revealed in the shed behind Laura accompanied by a startling sound
There is a loud crash as Laura listens against the wall
A presumably dead Benigna grabs Laura’s arm. [Video]
A window slides shut suddenly and breaks
A child’s hand grabs Laura from behind. [Video]
A hand slams the door closed
A shadow flies past Laura as she walks down the stairs
Sun-ju opens the closet door and there is a quick flash of an image of Sang-Mi’s corpse
Sun-ju looks up from the well and there is a loud flashback to the scene of the old woman from the tape
The TV suddenly turns on
A loud noise startles Sanda
Some mud hits the window on Sanda’s side of the car, followed by more mud seconds later
Sanda is strangled from behind
A hand appears at the window
As Lucas moves towards their car, the lights turn on and the car begins to drive away
The power in the house suddenly goes out
There is a loud noise and a bright light at the window that Lucas is looking out of
Windows in the house begin to open and shut
The alarm clock suddenly goes off beside Lucas and Clémentine
Someone runs behind Lucas causing him to swing the poker and break a window
Someone pushes the door with the broken window into Lucas
A sharp object is pushed through the hole in the door that Clementine is looking through
Clementine hears a noise while in the attic
An intruder grabs at Clementine through the plastic sheeting
As the camera pans, the hooded intruder comes into view
Lucas is dragged away suddenly
A girl narrates about her respect for her policeman father, who is looking at the camera and smiling. Suddenly, his head explodes
The mutant jumps out from behind some cops
The man in the black coat walks past in the background accompanied by a string sound effect
Yamaguchi jumps out, startling Kirie
Yamaguchi jumps out, startling Kirie and her friend
A body (Miyazaki) falls past Kirie, startling her. This is followed up immediately by a graphic shot of splattered brain matter from Miyazaki’s head along with a scream from Kirie
Yamaguchi jumps out, startling Kirie
The box opens and a Jack-in-the-Box pops out
Before Shuichi can finish his sentence, his mother lets out a loud scream and it cuts to her face which is now distorted slightly
The TV switches off suddenly
As the car turns the corner, Kirie’s dad flashes on the screen with a twisted tongue causing the occupants of the car to scream
The face opens it’s mouth and eyes, a spiral tongue flicking out as the camera quickly zooms in, and Kirie screams
Yamaguchi runs in front of, and is hit by a car. This is followed by an unsettingly gory scene
The camera rapidly and repeatedly zooms into the eye in the center of the spiral crack
The screen silently cycles through all the upsetting imagery that has appeared in the movie thus far
The channel changes quickly
Shuichi clasps his arms around Kirie
Shuichi raises himself in front of the camera
